search and Development, NAEB,

5:15 Indiana University Slide Presentation
(Room 2BC)
Topic: Indiana University’s New
Radio-Television Building.
Speaker: William Kroll, Technical
Supervisor, Indiana University Radio-
TV Service.
6-7 Reception (Room 2EF)
Refreshments courtesy of Chicago
stations WBKB (TV), WGN, Inc., and
WMAQ-WNBQ.
7 Banquet (Main Dining Room)
Presider: Harold E. Hill, Administra¬
tive Vice-President, NAEB.
Entertainment: ’’The Sound of Jazz,”
Art Hodes.
Address : ’’Broadcasting and the
Public Interest”
Speaker: Robert Lemon, Station Man¬
ager, WNBQ, NBC, Chicago.
